item.title: Venezuelan Opposition Leader Previews Mass Protests: ‘We Will Get Rid of Maduro’
item.description: Maria Corina Machado also told NR that Venezuelans are ‘excited’ by several of Trump’s top personnel picks.

item.title: For the Morgan Library’s 100th Birthday, a Look at Its Formidable First Director
item.description: Belle da Costa Greene’s legacy is artistic, but she had a secret.

item.title: The ISIS Threat Never Left
item.description: Why victories abroad are crucial for securing America’s homeland.

item.title: Why the FBI Chokes on the T-Word
item.description: Whether the bureau designates an Islamist attack “terrorism” depends on a dubious judgment that it was inspired by “false” Islamic teaching.

item.title: Trump Can Bring Transparency to the Transgender Mess
item.description: The Biden administration is complicit in a dangerous experiment on children, showing no regard for ethics. The next administration must do better.
